title: Risto-Matti Toivonen
text:
Risto-Matti Toivonen



I am a Sports Scientist with extensive experience in football analytics and research. My work focuses on using data-driven insights to enhance athletic performance, optimize training programs, and contribute to the overall success of professional football teams.

title: Home
text: This is the home page. Here you can write a brief introduction about yourself, your research, and anything else you want to share.

title: About
text:
Hi, I’m a Sports Scientist with 9 years of experience in professional football. My expertise lies in applying data-driven approach to guide decision-making, player profiling and long-term athletic development. I utilize advanced statistical analysis and machine learning to generate actionable insights that inform coaching strategies, enhance player development, and support recruitment decisions for relevant stakeholders.


University of Jyväskylä | Jyväskylä, Finland | Ph.D. in Sports Science | Sep 2022 - Present
University of Konstanz  | Konstanz, Germany | M.Sc. in Sports Science | Oct 2017 - Dec 2019
Satakunta University of Applied Sciences  | Pori, Finland | B.Sc. in Physiotherapy | Oct 2013 - Dec 2016



SJK Football Club | First Team Sports Scientist | Dec 2021 - present
Finnish Football National Team | U21 Sports Scientist | Jun 2021 - Jun 2022
HIFK Football Club | First Team Sports Scientist | Dec 2018 - Oct 2021
Pohjola Hospital | Sports Physiotherapist | Mar 2019 - Oct 2021
